channel.title: Dialogue Help
channel.description: I'm still figuring out how to add dialogue to an npc, and i've been stuck on the same problem for maybe an hour or two. I spawned an npc, made him say "hi how are you" and then when i click next there is an option that says "good" and one that says "terrible". but i can't figure out how to create a different response for each option. Can someone help?

item.title: Dialogue Help
item.dc:creator: @Carnifex12 Carnifex12
item.description:
@Carnifex12 wrote:

I’m still figuring out how to add dialogue to an npc, and i’ve been stuck on the same problem for maybe an hour or two. I spawned an npc, made him say “hi how are you” and then when i click next there is an option that says “good” and one that says “terrible”. but i can’t figure out how to create a different response for each option. Can someone help?

Read full topic
